parameter.name: bucketName
parameter.description: Name of the bucket.

parameter.name: objectKey
parameter.description: The name of the object to retrieve details for.

parameter.name: responseContentType
parameter.description: Content-Type header of the response.

parameter.name: responseContentLanguage
parameter.description: Content-Language header of the response.

parameter.name: responseCacheControl
parameter.description: Cache-Control header of the response.

parameter.name: responseContentDisposition
parameter.description: Content-Disposition header of the response.

parameter.name: responseContentEncoding
parameter.description: Content-Encoding header of the response

parameter.name: responseExpires
parameter.description: Expires header of the response.

parameter.name: range
parameter.description: HTTP range header.

parameter.name: ifModifiedSince
parameter.description: Return the object only if it has been modified.

parameter.name: ifUnmodifiedSince
parameter.description: Return the object only if it has not been modified.

parameter.name: ifMatch
parameter.description: Return the object only if its ETag is the same.

parameter.name: ifNoneMatch
parameter.description: Return the object only if its ETag is not same.

parameter.name: versionId
parameter.description: VersionId used to reference a specific version of the object.

parameter.name: sseCustomerAlgorithm
parameter.description: Specifies the algorithm to use to when encrypting the object.

parameter.name: sseCustomerKey
parameter.description: Specifies the customer-provided encryption key for Amazon S3 to use in encrypting data.

parameter.name: sseCustomerKeyMD5
parameter.description: Specifies the 128-bit MD5 digest of the encryption key according to RFC 1321.

parameter.name: requestPayer
parameter.description: Confirms that the requester knows that they will be charged for the request.

parameter.name: partNumber
parameter.description: Part number of the object being read.

parameter.name: destinationFilePath
parameter.description: Path to the file that response contents will be written to.
